List.Point: A tree that has at most 2 children
Normally named a left or right child
A binary Tree is a linear data structure
The top part of the tree is called a root same as in file system that is used in Linux
The ones that are directly under it are called children
The one directly above the child is know as a paren of that section and the one below it is know as the child of that section
Elements that have non chilren are called leaves
You can search through a brinary tree
